title: Soccer Sweetheart
description: Alternative cover for SOCCER SWEETHEART (final version of "Craving U")A heartfelt YA about true love, friendship and the pain of growing up. A story of young love that starts as a friendship but grows deep, set in the Montagues and Capulets land.* Limited edition for a limited time only, mainly digital and free on a read-to-review basis
author: Mirella Muffarotto
